lewis_skills: Some Technologies i’ve been working with recently
about_lewis:
With a DUT degree in Software Engineering and self-taught experience, I have been pursuing my studies in software engineering since 2018 while also working as a Graphic Designer. Furthermore, since 2020, I have been working concurrently as a Fullstack Developer. I have worked on various projects, both in teams and independently, for individuals and businesses. 
 I also have a personal product in my portfolio, which is an invoicing solution that I highly recommend for your entrepreneurial or SME activities.
focus_text: My main objective is to provide optimized, responsive, intuitive, and tailored solutions to meet your needs. To achieve this, I offer the following services:

terms_of_use_section_1_content: By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use this website.
terms_of_use_section_2_content: All content on this website, including text, images, and multimedia, is the property of Lewis TINA. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without prior written permission.
terms_of_use_section_3_content: The content of this website represents the work and projects of Lewis TINA. All rights to the designs, code, and intellectual property featured in the portfolio are reserved by Lewis TINA.
terms_of_use_section_4_content: To contact Lewis TINA, please use the contact information provided on this website. Any unsolicited communication or spam will be treated as a violation of these Terms of Use.
terms_of_use_section_5_content: This website is provided 'as is' without any warranties. Lewis TINA shall not be liable for any damages resulting from the use or inability to use this website.
terms_of_use_section_6_content: Lewis TINA reserves the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for updates.
privacy_policy_section_1_content: We may collect personal information, such as your name and email address, when you choose to contact us through this website.
privacy_policy_section_2_content: Any personal information collected will be used solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiries or providing requested services. We will not share your information with third parties without your consent.
privacy_policy_section_3_content: This website may use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings if you prefer not to have them stored on your device.
privacy_policy_section_4_content: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information. However, we cannot guarantee the security of data transmitted over the Internet. In France, personal data is protected by, for example, Law No. 78-87 of January 6, 1978, Law No. 2004-801 dated August 6, 2004, Article L. 226-13 of the Penal Code, and the European Directive of October 24, 1995. On the lewistina.com website, ABOUTOU TINA Pierre Lewis does not collect personal information (in accordance with Article 4 of Law No. 78-17 of January 6, 1978) concerning the user except for the purpose of providing various services offered by the lewistina.com website. The user provides this information knowingly, particularly when entering it themselves. It is therefore the responsibility of the user of the lewistina.com website to decide whether or not to disclose this information. In accordance with the provisions of Articles 38 and others of Law No. 78-17 of January 6, 1978, concerning information technology, files, and freedoms, any user has the right to access information, rectify, delete, and object to all personal information concerning them. To exercise this right, send your request to lewistina.com by email: contact@lewistina.com or in writing, accompanied by a copy of your identity document and a signature of the document owner, specifying the address to which a response should be sent. No personal information about the user of the lewistina.com website is published without the user's knowledge, exchanged, transferred, sold on any medium to groups. Only in the event of the purchase of the lewistina.com website and all its rights does ABOUTOU TINA Pierre Lewis have the right to transfer personal information to the potential buyer, who would be subject to the same obligation to store and modify data concerning the user of the lewistina.com website. The lewistina.com website complies with the GDPR; see our GDPR policy. Databases are secured by the obligations of the law of July 1, 1998, transposing Directive 96/9 of March 11, 1996 on the legal protection of databases.
privacy_policy_section_5_content: This website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these websites.
privacy_policy_section_6_content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. You will be notified of any changes on this page.

user_agreement: Any internet user who connects and uses the website: www.lewistina.com is considered a user of the website. The website www.lewistina.com offers various services, as is, made available to users. It is naturally specified that users must remain honest and act in good faith towards other users and the Creator of the lewistina.com website. The lewistina.com website is regularly updated by ABOUTOU TINA Pierre Lewis. ABOUTOU TINA Pierre Lewis strives to provide the most accurate information on the lewistina.com website (subject to changes), but cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, and information transmitted on its website, whether by its own actions or those of third-party partners who provide this information. Consequently, the user acknowledges that they use the information provided under their sole responsibility.
site_accessibility: The lewistina.com website is generally accessible to users 24/7, except in the event of planned or unplanned interruptions for maintenance or force majeure. In the event of unavailability of the service, lewistina.com will do its utmost to restore access to the site and will attempt to communicate the dates and times of the intervention to users in advance. Being subject only to a means obligation, lewistina.com cannot be held responsible for any damage, of any nature whatsoever, resulting from unavailability of the service.
intellectual_property: ABOUTOU TINA Pierre Lewis is the sole owner of all intellectual property rights or holds usage rights for all elements accessible on the following site, both structurally and in terms of texts, images, graphics, logos, soundtracks, software, etc. Any reproduction, even partial, of the lewistina.com website, display, editing, total or partial updating of any of these elements, by any means or technique, is prohibited, except with the prior written consent of ABOUTOU TINA Pierre Lewis, the website's director. Representation, editing, adaptation, in whole or in part, of any of these elements, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited, except with the prior consent of ABOUTOU TINA Pierre Lewis, the website's director, at the following email address: contact@lewistina.com, otherwise it will be treated as counterfeiting and subject to prosecution in accordance with the provisions of Articles L.335-2 and following of the Intellectual Property Code.
